info.name: PokÃ©mon Showdown - DarkFlat+
info.description:
A simple, minimalist and modern style combining the elements of 3 styles and making everything dark and easy on the eyes. Features a new header and teambuilder.

Header taken from https://userstyles.org/styles/99306/pok-mon-showdown-skin
Main body based on https://userstyles.org/styles/178357/pokemon-showdown-minimal-dark
Teambuilder from https://userstyles.org/styles/115829/dark-teambuilder-pokemon-showdown-theme
info.additionalInfo:
== MAKE SURE YOU USE DARK MODE! ==
The theme will not look as shown in the screenshots if you have disabled dark mode. Click on the settings button in top right corner and check Dark Mode in the pop up menu.

Changelog:

24 January 2020
- Added a dark cave battle background, new HP bars and tooltips. Fixed some visual errors.

20 January 2020
- Fixed weather name and turns not showing.

12 January 2020
- Added move buttons and weather effects.
